sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_GET.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS u_no
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type = :P1 /* {{$_GET.user_type}} */

SELECT md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

UPDATE m_users
SET user_fname = :P1 /* {{$_GET.name}} */, user_type = :P2 /* {{$_GET.user_type}} */, u_status = :P3 /* {{$_GET.status}} */, updated_by = :P4 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P5 /* {{NOW}} */, scheme_id = :P6 /* {{$_GET.scheme_id}} */, aadhar_no = :P7 /* {{$_GET.aadhar}} */, pan_no = :P8 /* {{$_GET.pan}} */, address = :P9 /* {{$_GET.address}} */, pin = :P10 /* {{$_GET.pin}} */, state = :P11 /* {{$_GET.state}} */, district = :P12 /* {{$_GET.district}} */, blank3 = :P13 /* {{$_GET.firm_name}} */
WHERE id = :P14 /* {{$_GET.user_id}} */

UPDATE t_scheme_user
SET scheme1 = :P1 /* {{$_GET.scheme0}} */, scheme2 = :P2 /* {{$_GET.scheme1}} */, scheme3 = :P3 /* {{$_GET.scheme2}} */, scheme4 = :P4 /* {{$_GET.scheme3}} */, updated_by = :P5 /* {{identity}} */, updated_on = :P6 /* {{NOW}} */
WHERE user_id = :P7 /* {{$_GET.user_id}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountNewUser
FROM m_users
WHERE user_mobile = :P1 /* {{$_GET.mobile}} */

INSERT INTO m_users
(user_id, user_fname, user_mobile, user_email, password, salt, user_type, u_status, created_by, created_on, user_lname, cap_amt, balance_amt, balance_outstanding, aeps_balance, scheme_id, aadhar_no, pan_no, address, pin, state, district, blank1, md_id, ds_id, blank2, blank3, user_tpin, kyc_status) VALUES (:P1 /* {{UniqueID}} */, :P2 /* {{$_GET.name}} */, :P3 /* {{$_GET.mobile}} */, :P4 /* {{$_GET.email.lowercase()}} */, :P5 /* {{password.sha256(NOW)}} */, :P6 /* {{NOW}} */, :P7 /* {{$_GET.user_type}} */, '1', :P8 /* {{identity}} */, :P9 /* {{NOW}} */, :P10 /* {{'https://github.com/ddo.png'}} */, '0', '0', '0', '0', :P11 /* {{$_GET.scheme_id}} */, :P12 /* {{$_GET.aadhar}} */, :P13 /* {{$_GET.pan}} */, :P14 /* {{$_GET.address}} */, :P15 /* {{$_GET.pin}} */, :P16 /* {{$_GET.state}} */, :P17 /* {{$_GET.district}} */, :P18 /* {{password}} */, :P19 /* {{$_GET.user_type == 2 ? identity : GetMdtDt.md_id}} */, :P20 /* {{$_GET.user_type == 2 ? 0 : identity}} */, :P21 /* {{$_GET.mobile}} */, :P22 /* {{$_GET.firm_name}} */, :P23 /* {{1234}} */, :P24 /* {{3}} */)

INSERT INTO t_scheme_user
(user_id, scheme1, scheme2, scheme3, scheme4, created_by, created_on, for_user_type) VALUES (:P1 /* {{AddUser.identity}} */, :P2 /* {{$_GET.scheme0}} */, :P3 /* {{$_GET.scheme1}} */, :P4 /* {{$_GET.scheme2}} */, :P5 /* {{$_GET.scheme3}} */, :P6 /* {{identity}} */, :P7 /* {{NOW}} */, '3')

SELECT api_code, username, api_password, api_type, senderid, api_url
FROM m_api
WHERE api_type = :P1 /* {{'Whatsapp'}} */ AND status = 1

params.message:
{{'Dear '+$_GET.name+', Your Account has been created successfully. User Login Id '+$_GET.mobile+', Password  is '+password+' and default T-PIN is 1234 .
Update Password and TPIN after login to web portal or mobile app.
Thanks for using our services. 😊
Regards 
S W Pay Team'}}

sql.query:
SELECT m_api.api_code, m_api.username, m_api.api_password, m_api.senderid, m_api.api_url, sms_api_details.entity_id, sms_api_details.template_id
FROM m_api
LEFT JOIN t_sms_api_details AS sms_api_details ON (sms_api_details.api_id = m_api.id)
WHERE m_api.api_type = :P1 /* {{'SMS'}} */ AND m_api.status = 1 AND sms_api_details.sms_code = :P2 /* {{'ADDU'}} */ AND sms_api_details.status = '1'

params.message:
{{'Dear Partner, Your Account has been created successfully. User Name '+$_GET.mobile+' Password  '+password+' TPIN 1234 . 
Thanks for using our service.
Regards S W Pay Team
'}}

values.value: {{'Dear Partner, Your Account has been created successfully. User Name '+$_GET.mobile+' Password  '+password+' TPIN XXXX . Thanks for using our service.\nRegards S W Pay Team'}}

sql.query:
INSERT INTO t_sms_log
(sms_message, sender_mobile, created_on, sms_type, ip_address, status, response, user_id) VALUES (:P1 /* {{'Dear Partner, Your Account has been created successfully. User Name '+$_GET.mobile+' Password  '+password+' TPIN XXXX . Thanks for using our service.\nRegards S W Pay Team'}} */, :P2 /* {{$_GET.mobile}} */, :P3 /* {{NOW}} */, :P4 /* {{'Add New User SMS'}} */, :P5 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P6 /* {{api_status == 200 ? 1 : 0}} */, :P7 /* {{api_response}} */, :P8 /* {{AddUser.identity}} */)

params.name: :P1
params.value: {{'Dear Partner, Your Account has been created successfully. User Name '+$_GET.mobile+' Password  '+password+' TPIN XXXX . Thanks for using our service.\nRegards S W Pay Team'}}
